Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2012...
Injured on 7/25/2013 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/2/2014, off Mike Montgomery (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/17/2014, off Ricky Nolasco (HOU)...
Injured on 9/5/2016 with a Broken Ribs, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/2/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Released by Los Angeles (A) on 7/7/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 7/7/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Cleveland on 5/15/2021 (Going to CLE: C M. McHenry, LF J. Olson. Going to PIT: C A. Hedges)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 2/21/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2023...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 7/3/2024...
